meanings.definition: A unit of land area in ancient Egypt
meanings.sent1: In ancient Egypt, a khet was a measure of land used for farming.
meanings.sent2: The farmers in ancient Egypt would often work on their khet to grow crops.
meanings.sent3: The pharaoh decided to gift a khet of land to the hardworking farmer.
meanings.sent4: The khet of fertile soil seemed like a golden opportunity for the villagers.
meanings.sent5: The khet stretched out like a green carpet under the Egyptian sun.

meanings.definition: A type of ancient Egyptian board game
meanings.sent1: Children in ancient Egypt enjoyed playing the khet board game.
meanings.sent2: The khet game pieces were intricately carved and painted.
meanings.sent3: The siblings laughed as they played the khet game together.
meanings.sent4: The khet board game was a battlefield of strategy and wit.
meanings.sent5: The khet game brought joy and competition to the Egyptian household.

meanings.definition: A type of ancient Egyptian agricultural land
meanings.sent1: The farmers carefully tended to their khet to ensure a good harvest.
meanings.sent2: The khet fields were lush with crops during the harvest season.
meanings.sent3: The villagers celebrated the bountiful yield from their khet.
meanings.sent4: The khet land was the lifeblood of the Egyptian community.
meanings.sent5: The khet landscape painted a picture of abundance and prosperity.

meanings.sent1: The khet fabric was soft to the touch and vibrant in color.
meanings.sent2: She admired the khet pattern on the ancient Egyptian tapestry.
meanings.sent3: The khet design on the pottery added a touch of elegance.
meanings.sent4: The khet hue of the wall brought warmth to the room.
meanings.sent5: The khet decorations adorned the temple walls with beauty.

meanings.sent3: The scholars debated the significance of the term 'khet' in historical texts.
